WorkItem.Description:
I am experiencing differing results using Html Agility Pack when trying to match an attribute starting with a given value. Using the sample HTML below: ``` Title

Loren ipsum

``` Using DocumentNode.SelectNodes() with the following query returns no results: ``` //*/@*[starts-with(name(), 'on')] ``` But using DocumentNode.SelectNodes() with the following query does return results: ``` //*/@*[starts-with(local-name(), 'on')] ``` I believe these should return the same results.
WorkItem.Summary: Differing results returned using name and local-name()
